Summary: Noticed two orange light traveling East. They got close slowed down and then the lights faded out and disappeared.
divs: sighting detailsi was coming home from an doctors appointment and pulled in my drive way at about 19:15 (1-17-13). i happened to look up after hearing an airplane pass over head, and i noticed two copper\orange lights off to the west.i thought maybe they where helicopters but i heard no noise. they seemed to be moving pretty slowly to the east from the west. the lights seemed to have a flicker to them. i watched them for about 2-3 minutes and the lights got closer together and then they slowly faded out. i thought maybe the clouds covered them up so i waited to see if they would come through the clouds but i saw nothing after waiting form another 2-3 minutes. i doing really recall feeling anything besides what the hell are they, and where did they go.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Phillipsburg
There were no other sightings in Phillipsburg on or around January 17th 2013
